mapper.insert: insert into servs(servsid , servsname , money , contents , hits , sellnum , addtime ) values(#{servsid} , #{servsname} , #{money} , #{contents} , #{hits} , #{sellnum} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update servs set servsname=#{servsname} , money=#{money} , contents=#{contents} , hits=#{hits} , sellnum=#{sellnum} , addtime=#{addtime} where servsid=#{servsid}
mapper.select: select a.* from servs a order by servsid desc
select a.* from servs a where servsid=#{servsid} order by servsid desc

select a.* from servs a where 1=1
and a.servsname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{servsname}, '%'))
and a.money like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{money}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.hits like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{hits}, '%'))
and a.sellnum like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{sellnum}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
